title: Ariel Shamai Returns Home
body: Hundreds of talmdiim at Ateres Shlomo yeshiva in Rishon Lezion welcomed back Ariel Shamai after a 15-day prison sentence for refusing IDF enlistment. The celebration followed the levayah of Rebbetzin Leah Faiga Sorotzkin a”h.

title: Rivlin vs Bloom on Draft Law
body: Yaakov Rivlin and attorney Avi Bloom clash over PM Netanyahu's handling of the draft law, sparking coalition tensions with chareidi partners.
